    • adminInsertRoomDetails

      public static void adminInsertRoomDetails (String room_Description, int max_Capacity, String booking_Date, String booking_Time)
      This method is for admin to insert details in roomDetails database.
      Parameters:
      room_Description - The description of the room.
      max_Capacity - The maximum capacity or the room.
      booking_Date - The available date of the room.
      booking_Time - The available time of the room.

    • insertSDetails

      public static void insertSDetails (String staff_Id, String room_Id)
      This method will insert staff details into staffDetails database.
      Parameters:
      staff_Id - The staff ID.
      room_Id - The room ID.

    • insertRoomDetails

      public static void insertRoomDetails (String room_Id, String staff_Id, String room_Description, int max_Capacity, String booking_Date, String booking_Time, String status, String booking_Id)
      This method is to insert the room details into roomDetails database manually.
      Parameters:
      room_Id - The ID of the room.
      staff_Id - The staff ID that in-charge in this room.
      room_Description - The description of the room.
      max_Capacity - The maximum capacity or the room.
      booking_Date - The available date of the room.
      booking_Time - The available time of the room.
      status - The status of the room: Available or Booked.
      booking_Id - The booking ID of the room.

    • insertBookingIdIntoRoomDetails

      public static void insertBookingIdIntoRoomDetails (String bookingId, String roomId)
      This method is to insert the new generated booking ID into the roomDetails class based on the room ID.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - The booking ID that wants to be inserted.
      roomId - The selected room ID.

    • guestDetails

      public static void guestDetails (String room_Id, String nric, String name, String mobile_No, String email, String purpose)
      This method is to insert the user's details into the guestDetails database.
      Parameters:
      room_Id - The selected room ID.
      nric - User's NRIC number.
      name - User's name.
      mobile_No - User's mobile number.
      email - User's email address.
      purpose - User's purpose on booking the room.

    • roomBooked

      public static void roomBooked (String roomId)
      This method is to change the status to Booked in roomDetails database based on the room ID.
      Parameters:
      roomId - The selected room ID.

    • roomAvailable

      public static void roomAvailable (String roomId)

      Parameters:
      roomId - The selected room ID.

      bookingId - The selected booking ID.

    • getBookingIdFromGuestDetails

      public static String getBookingIdFromGuestDetails (String roomId)
      This method is to get the booking ID from the guestDetails database based on the room ID. The purpose is to inform user their booking ID after they have confirmed their booking.
      Parameters:
      roomId - The selected room ID.
      Returns:
      The booking ID.
